system.description: Effect: The target loses 2 Stacks on Drowsy, Nightmares, Confused, Flinched, Disabled, Suppressed, Enraged, Charmed, Fear, and Taunted conditions it possesses. A target afflicted with Hyper Mode is cured of Hyper Mode.
